description: This table contains the Blood Product information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: BLOOD_PRODUCT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The blood product type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BLOOD_MSR_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unit of measure for the estimated value.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
